def factorial(c):
    n1=1
    n2=2
    num=1
    while num!=c:
        n1=(n1)*(n2)
        n2+=1
        num+=1
    return n1
def zero(n):
    zeroes=0
    i=1
    t=(5**i)
    k=n/t
    while t<=n:
        t=(5**i)
        k=n/t
        zeroes+=k
        i+=1
    return zeroes
i =int(raw_input())
while  i !=0:

    print (((factorial(i))/(10** zero(i)))%10)
    i =int(raw_input())
